2019.title: LDMblue high-power diode laser
2019.description: LDMblue revolutionizes the processing of copper, gold and other highly reflective metals in multiple ways.

2019.title: SOPRANO
2019.description: SOPRANO is a femtosecond laser for material-processing and multiphoton imaging designed for industrial as well as scientific environments and to deliver reliable 24/7 operation.

2019.title: Leica BLK3D
2019.description: The BLK3D combines a calibrated stereo camera, measurement sensors, software, and on-device edge detection capabilities to make in-picture measurements with professional-grade accuracy.

2019.title: SPINDLE®
2019.description: The SPINDLE® is an attachment for widefield microscopes that captures high-precision, super-resolution 3D imagery of cellular structures down to the single molecular level.

2019.title: L-1200 laser system
2019.description: The laser cutting and engraving system L-1200 offers unique precision and cut quality at highest cutting speeds, applicable to any material to be processed by individually choosing the right laser power.

2019.title: SLIDEVIEW VS200
2019.description: The SLIDEVIEW™ VS200 system is designed to capture a wide variety of samples and stains with multiple magnifications, flexible slide sizes, and five versatile imaging modes.
